title: Arctic Animal King Penguin (Full Version)
description: Arctic Animal King Penguin (Full Version) (InPlace and Root Motion Animations))
longDescription:
This is a High Poly 3D Model of a King Penguin from Late Cretaceous Period version.

King Penguin - SHP 12788 tris

Model has 36 bones.

- 1 Color Textures, 1 Normal, 1Ambient Oclusion Maps(all 4k)

Model has 59 In Place Animations and 83 Root Motion Animations
